640: Delphinus Engineering offers an empowering professional environment in a culture that stresses teamwork, independence, shared responsibility for company and client success, and personal growth. GENERAL SUMMARY: Professional with at least 2-5 years of proven experience providing engineering and analysis support. LOCATION: Naval Surface Warfare Center Carderock, West Bethesda, MD PRINCIPAL DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES: Conducting testing and evaluation of marine environmental systems/subsystems in a laboratory setting (e.g., full-scale wastewater transfer equipment evaluation, and bench-scale surfactant experiments). Troubleshooting systems when necessary. Researching marine environmental equipment for the US Navy. Drafting test plans and operating procedures for research and development laboratory testing and evaluation purposes. Documenting results in the form of equipment matrices, large data analyses, and detailed final reports.
